import React from 'react' import './Testimonial.css' import { testimonialsData } from '../../data/testimonialsData' import { useState } from 'react' const Testimonial = () => { const [selected, setSelected] = useState(0); const tLength = testimonialsData.length; return (
Testimonials What they say about us {testimonialsData[selected].review} {testimonialsData[selected].name}
) } export default Testimonial
